      • OslcOAuthClient

        public OslcOAuthClient(String consumerKey,
               String consumerSecret)
        Creates a two-legged OAuth client. This will only work if the server supports two-legged OAuth and a functional user has been assigned for this OAuth consumer.
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - the OAuth consumer key
        consumerSecret - the OAuth consumer secret

      • getResourceInternal

        protected net.oauth.OAuthMessage getResourceInternal(String url,
                                         String httpMethod,
                                         boolean restart)
                                              throws IOException,
                                                     net.oauth.OAuthException,
                                                     URISyntaxException
        Performs necessary OAuth negotiation. - get request token - throw redirect exception to authorization URL (and print message) - exchange request token for access token - access protected URL and return OAuthMessage

        httpMethod -
        restart -

        Throws:
